segments.text: Do you like the Harry potter books and movies ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why not ? They are very fun and exiting .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Maybe , but I think they are just for kids .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , that ’ s not true . Many adults like the Harry potter books too .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Maybe they don ’ t agree with my taste .
segments.speaker: S2
